nodes.text: The Heavy Artillery Gun (HAG) was a mobile repulsorlift artillery piece used by the Trade Federation and superficially resembled their Multi-Troop Transports.

The HAG greatly resembled the MTT, but replaced the troop carrier bay with a massive artillery cannon, which had tremendous range. It had heavy armor which made it very resistant to laser cannons though bombs proved effective at destroying them.
It had very poor speed and maneuverability, and needed to anchor itself in place with two stabilizer paddles in order to fire its main cannon.

The HAG saw its first major engagement during the Trade Federation's Invasion of Naboo while attacking a Resistance outpost. Though the HAGs held the potential to devastate the turrets protecting the encampment, their heavy armor did not protect them from the powerful explosives of Havoc, Nym's personal craft, as he helped defend the encampment.
Later, they took part in the battle with the Gungan Grand army.
